body.name: SHARP ZSMC1464HS Oven with Removable 12.4" Carousel Turntable. Orville Redenbacher's Certified Cubic Feet, 1100 Watt with Inverter Technology Countertop Microwave, 1.4 CuFt, Stainless Steel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 18 mins
features: Family-sized 1.4 cu. ft. capacity, 1100 watts, Stainless
New! Gray Interior; New! White LED Display; New! LED Interior Lighting; New! Inverter Cooking Technology
12.4" Carousel turntable for even cooking; 10 Power Levels with 2-stage cooking
Convenient "+30 seconds" key for instant start; Melt/Soften Function; Sensor Cook for precise cooking and reheating; Auto Cook for popular menu items
Weight and Time Defrost for quick and accurate thawing; Convenient "Express Cook" with single press up to 6 mins cooking
body.description: Sharp's family-sized 1.4 cu. Ft. 1100W countertop microwave oven is a great choice for reheating and everyday cooking. Its medium footprint allows for flexible placement options and 1100 watts of power give you rapid reheating and fast cooking. Innovative features like one-touch controls, auto defrost and the carousel turntable system make cooking and reheating your favorite foods, snacks and beverages easier. With decades of experience designing smart innovative microwaves, it’s easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust SHARP carousel.

productInformation.value: Countertop Microwave Oven with Removable 12.4" Carousel Turntable. Orville Redenbacher's Certified. 1.4 Cubic Feet, 1100 Watt with Inverter Technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inverter Best Way to Go
reviews.reviewText: This is a great microwave. The best part is it is an inverter microwave. Point of fact most microwaves are not inverter and no matter the power level you set, they blast full power. The non-inverter microwaves just reduce how often they blast full power. This is why the non-inverter microwaves cause popping and splattering no matter what you set them on. The inverter microwaves, however, actually reduce the power and keep it on steady at that level. So a much, much better way to go. I like most of the features on this microwave except the sensor ones. Never had much luck with sensor settings so I don't use them. If I had one minor complaint, I wish it was easier to set the power levels and change them during the cooking process since that is my main reason for ordering an inverter microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vendor delivered the unit three days early, which was appreciated.
reviews.reviewText: Unit was delivered early and in great condition. Power level was higher than our previous unit (1000 instead of 900) so had to make some trial and error adjustments on the time to prepare food (usually shorter time). Unit works as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and Power
reviews.reviewText: Super quiet with plenty of power. User friendly. Does everything I need a microwave to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my 3rd Sharp Carousel in 30 years. My last one still worked but the door hooks would match and parts are no longer made so I had to buy new. The bottom little legs are either not even (yes I checked and tried to adjust them) or the metal base is warped. I had to put a piece of cardboard under one leg to keep it level. It would drive me nuts wobbling if I didn’t. Not worth returning over. It looks and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Keypad does not work
reviews.reviewText: After plugging in, I tried to set clock, just to find out that the numbers 7,8,9,0 do not work. I read all instructions and still can’t figure out why those numbers don’t work. I did order this a while ago, and finally unpacked it. The Amazon driver left on the pavement in front of the apartment mailboxes, instead of leaving at my front door. I am 75 years old with 2 herniated discs, and really struggled to get the box up 6 steps. Now I’m not sure how to return it or get repaired. Also, there was no packing slip, so I’m at a loss as how to provide proof of purchase. I hope someone from Amazon will respond to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Microwave for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This microwave is great! Does everything I want and more. This microwave is a bargain.
